content.rendered:
Digital Transformation and Innovation Partner

Expertise
Discover people, projects, experience, and read our story that makes Prishtina REA internationally known agency innovation developments.

About Us

20 Milestone

Prishtina REA, during its 24 years of operation, as Innovation, Digital Transformation and ICT Lead, has been one of the driving forces behind the development and growth of the Kosovar business advisory and consulting sector, innovation and ICT & digital sector, including Digital Agenda 2030, VET, e-ID Solution, non-formal professional education, EEN Country Coordinator, EIC Accelerator – Innovation Lead, Matching Grant Scheme Implementer (of 10.4 mil Euro), Digital Transformation and International Standard Certification in Tourism,  member of EBN and INSME, with a well networked and organized presence of donor-based programs and government modernization.
 
Discover more
Our Company By Number
0 +

Years Experience

Projects Done

0 +

No. of Applicants to our Training Calls

0 +

No. of Participants to local B2B Events

What We Offer

Technical Assistance

Prishtina REA provides tailored solutions combined with qualified local and international experts for projects financed by international donors.

Economic Development

Prishtina REA works with central and local governments, public institutions, associations and the private sector to foster and promote economic development.

Public Sector Development

We are focused also, towards implementation of the projects in area of public administration reforms, legal reforms and similar projects with governmental bodies and civil society to help stakeholders towards development of the public sector and to improve good governance.
Our Projects
Consultancy services under “Knowledge for Reform Action in the Western Balkans”

Day 2 in Cannes for our ICT delegation from Kosovo!
Our delegation is diving deep into the world of AI at the World AI Cannes Festival (WAICF), exploring the latest trends, innovations, and cutting-edge solutions that are shaping the future of technology. ..

Our ICT delegation from Kosovo is currently in France for the B2B Matchmaking Event and the World AI Cannes Festival 2025!
Our ICT delegation from Kosovo is currently in France for the B2B Matchmaking Event and the World AI Cannes Festival 2025. We are engaging with industry leaders, exploring innovative technologies..

Read More
Testimonial

What they say about us

Prishtina REA team did a very attractive, efficient and hands-on campaign, which exceeded our expectations. They were very professional, eager to cooperate with all partners and stakeholders, respecting fully the visibility and communication rules and promoting widely the project and its achievements
Giuseppe Moschetti Project Director
We are very happy that EU Support for the competitiveness of Kosovo's ICT sector is among the best EU funded promoted project and got the hight visibility thanks to the highly dedicated and professional work undertaken by Prishtina REA team
Kostas METAXIOTIS(WE GLOBAL) Project Director
Prishtina REA, presented high creativity, great flexibility, cooperation ability and client oriented approach. They significantly contributed to the outstanding result of the whole campaign. Prishtina REA, fully fulfilled all conditions of the contract and their results are appreciated with thanks of the Project Team and Contractor.
Bohuslav PokornyTeam Leader

Prishtina REA is certified with two ISO standards: ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 27001:2013. Our commitment to these internationally recognized standards ensures that we maintain a high level of quality and information security in all aspects of our operations.
